channel.title: How to add zammy godwars boss?
channel.description: I'm using a Delta, I put the model in the model folder and added the npc stuff in the npc java file in the client, yet when I spawn him my game freezes and logs me out until I reset the server which resets all npcs...Whats up with this? Thanks for your help

item.title: How to add zammy godwars boss?
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

yeah if its delta defo try addmodel (modelnumber)

Read full topic
item.source: How to add zammy godwars boss?

item.title: How to add zammy godwars boss?
item.dc:creator: @u_loose u loose
item.description:
@u_loose wrote:

I’ve never used delta.
But with pi, in your spawn-config.java it has all the mobster spawns.
And it’s something like.

Spawn = xx xxxx xxxx 0 0 0 0

Xx means npc Id
First xxxx is the x coord
Second xxxx is the y coord

Read full topic
item.source: How to add zammy godwars boss?
